title: Chinese leaf and tofu stir fry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons cooking oil', '100g dried tofu, cut into thick slices', '1 whole Chinese leaf cabbage, leaves torn into bite-sized pieces', 'soy sauce to taste', '2 tomatoes, peeled and cut into small pieces', '1 spring onion, cut into 2cm lengths', 'salt to taste', 'sugar to taste', 'chicken or vegetable stock granules to taste']
